website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you are looking for a liquid formula with limited ingredients that absorbs effectively, and you don't mind the high price.
pros: This B12 supplement comes in liquid methylcobalamin form that's known to absorb fast
cons: Expensive, and you only get 30 doses per bottle
Some consumers gripe about the flavor being odd

customer_reviews.title: High Anxiety Response
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this supplement! It was recommended by my doctor, and this was the cleanest and most potent form that she had found. I took it in the morning before eating, and had extremely high anxiety symptoms all day. Shaking hands, rapid heart rate, sweating, nausea... I was hoping it was from something else, because I wanted this to work! I experimented on another day with the same reaction. Perhaps my body is just strangely sensitive, but wanted others to be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyelle

customer_reviews.title: Sent me a bottle made SIX years ago!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for several months and it's been very helpful and tastes good. However, my most recent bottle tastes very different (not good) and there's a white sticker on the bottom of the bottle with the date May 8, 2012! Over SIX years old! Perhaps that's why it tastes funny... Normally, I would've given the product 5 stars but I don't like the fact that they sent me a bottle made six years ago. Watch out for the date.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Medical medium followers DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I follow MEDICAL MEDIUM PROTOCOL and am a huge supporter & this came recommended... after taking 2 almost 3 weeks. .. this does not work ... does not make a difference it’s a waste of money. They must have changed their product upon receiving all the business because this is the 2nd purchase from global healing I have made and their products are junk. If you want energy I recommend rebounding and getting a trampoline with this 30.00 bucks rather than wasting it on this liquid red BS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love! I let a drop sit under my tongue ...
customer_reviews.text: Love! I let a drop sit under my tongue for a minute in the morning and around 2-3pm. Increases energy without the effects of stimulants...very mellow natural energy boost with no side effects. UPDATE: my B12 levels were around 645 when I started this a year ago, and today my levels are 1,450 which is high. I reduced the amount to 1/4 dropper and will check my levels in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyM

customer_reviews.title: I received an expired bottle of VeganSafe B-12
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with this product. Today is 12/08/2018 and this expired 05/08/2012. This is horrible and unacceptable, please check the expiration date on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Denyelle

customer_reviews.title: EXPIRED PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this product and the last bottle they sent me smelled/tasted funny and the expiration sticker on the bottom says 5082012. I am very disappointed. I have not been feeling well and I wonder if this has something to do with it. Be careful when purchasing this product because I believe something has happened to the quality of their product.
customer_reviews.author: sara bueso

customer_reviews.title: Most effective B12 I've ever tried
customer_reviews.text: I felt some effects from this supplement after the first use! I am a vegan who had not been supplementing B12 like you should, and I was feeling awful... tired, uninspired, unmotivated, etc. I tried some other B12 supplements (cyanocobalamin, hydroxycobalamin and methylcobalamin by itself) and none seemed to help. I took this supplement one time and it felt as though a fog started lifting out of my head. Within a week I was feeling so much better! I feel like my interest in life has returned and my energy level is finally getting back to normal. Give it a try :)
customer_reviews.author: William Hannah

customer_reviews.title: BEST B12 EVER
customer_reviews.text: Can not live without this....well actually I could live, lol, just miserably though. I follow the Medical Medium protocol and I bought 2 other adeno b12 previously, because I ( foolishly) thought I could save some money, but they do not work as well as this! I take 10 drops in h20 daily and when I miss a dose I totally can feel the difference. We all need b12 supplementation. Our food ( regardless if you are vegan or not) is totally depleted of this vital nutrient.
customer_reviews.author: 00_jackie_00

customer_reviews.title: EXPIRED Product
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this product before and liked it b/c I noticed I had a little more energy on days I took it. So I ordered it again in Dec. 2018. Imagine my disappointment when the same product didn't have the same positive effect as my first bottle. I checked the expiration date and, like so many other reviewers, saw my B-12 product expired in 2012!!! I ordered another product from this company as well, and it too is expired!! Nothing like ruining a hard earned business reputation for quality by selling countless expired and therefore ineffective products!!
customer_reviews.author: mmccoy2000

customer_reviews.title: Amazing source of energy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a WOW for me. I was feeling super sluggish and depressed. I kept on researching what it could possible be. I don’t often rely on doctors and pills as I have done in the past. I’m on a path in my 40s stay strong and active as I feel the menopause coming on. Pilates and Vitamins are apart of my holistic journal. God bless anyone going through the change of life.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Don't B12 stupid, order this!
customer_reviews.text: I was vitamin B12 deficient and decided to order this product. It is simple to take and has a nice flavor. In the last month my hair has stopped falling out (after 3-4 months of hair loss) and I no longer feel bone tired and like I need to sleep all day long. I will be going back to the doctor to have my B12 levels checked and will do a follow up review, but so far so good. I will buy again when I run out, which I almost have! I love that it's natural and not derived from any type of cyanide.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but a bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: I recently started eating plant-based, so B 12 supplementation is a must. I chose this brand as it was recommended by several pages I follow on social media. It is a great product, and a good flavor, but I just don’t think I can justify the price. I ended up switching to my kind organics which appears to be similar quality at a more reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: esneefe

customer_reviews.title: It's not for me
customer_reviews.text: No matter how I take this stuff, I always end up feeling horrible within minutes. I've tried taking it as directed (on an empty stomach) and with food but no matter how I take it I always end up feeling nauseous for about 30 minutes to an hour afterward. My other vitamins usually make me feel great after I take them, but this one cancels them out. I won't be taking it any more.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good, but expensive.  Found an alternative!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this liquid for months and it's good. But the price for the dosage is very high. I switched to another brand and so far it's just as good, with a higher dosage for a lot less money. It also has both types of B12 in it. They're both good but this one is such a better deal. > Seeking Health | Active B12 Vitamin Supplement | 5,000 mcg
customer_reviews.author: Light Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Terrific supplement!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on January 10th and it arrived two days later. I've been using it everyday, half dropper at 6:30am and half at 1pm. The difference in my mood and energy through the day was immediate. I ran out two days ago and I feel run down and exhausted by the end of the day. While taking this, I would go home and still have energy to cook dinner, clean up, etc. I would highly suggest this if you feel sluggish, have brain fog or need an extra boost of energy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality isn't as good as it used to be
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for over a year and it has been consistent until the last 2 I've purchased from Amazon. They don't taste the same, not fresh, I honestly can't even take it it's so terrible. Not sure what's going on now. It's not the same as my doctor's office for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Daron Moulton

customer_reviews.title: Label on bottle "05082012", expired?
customer_reviews.text: Feeling lucky? I'm not about to put this into my body. Can't make the deadline to return. Wish I examined this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really like the non-expired product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a few months and feel I have more energy (five stars). Unfortunately, the last bottle I ordered had a different taste and made me nauseous. I noticed a white sticker on the bottom with the numbers 05082012. If that's the expiration date this is over six years old. Really like the non-expired product, but won't be ordering from this company anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Something in the ingredients recently changed
customer_reviews.text: I feel like something in the product changed recently. I’ve been using this now for 4 months. Just recently bought another one and my entire body broke out in strange hives. I could Not figure it what the deal was but I tried Again today and my neck started itching within 10 minutes of taking this. The taste has always been sweet, but this bottle has a much different taste as well. Not happy with whatever changed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: This product came with no expiration date, the last digit of the year is omitted. It did absolutely nothing for me. I can compare because I switched to this brand from a different one assuming that organic must be better. More than that, I returned to the same condition I started with after one week of talking this brand B12. And finally it's extremely expensive and it's not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Galina

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: Truly worked 1000 times better than expected. I took regularly for a year and noticed improvement in energy and mood within a week. Had to cut back to half a dropper. Then I stopped taking them for about 6 months to try cheaper alternatives. Noticed decline in well being after about 3 months. Took them again and within a week felt better. After a month I feel great!
customer_reviews.author: AmericanMom

customer_reviews.title: Caused swollen, irritated throat and MUCH too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend taking this supplement directly as suggested. It should be diluted in food or water as it is extremely potent. It made my throat sore and swollen literally seconds after consuming 1mL on its own. I tried it again 1 week later and same response. It’s also WAY too sweet which may contribute to the irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Love this B12, but the price increase is an absolute shame
customer_reviews.text: This B12 has been effective in keeping my levels high, however, the recent price increase is such a total shame. It's significant enough that I have looked for other brands. The company needs to bring the price back to where it was and stop taking advantage of one influencers promotion of the product.
customer_reviews.author: shelly

customer_reviews.text: This supplement is wonderful! I found about about it through the Medical Medium (he has a podcast and a couple of books- "Medical Medium" and "Life Changing Foods" . After a few weeks of taking this, I noticed an improvement in my mood, less PMS symptoms and better digestion.
customer_reviews.author: Kittycat

customer_reviews.title: Glycerin a problem
customer_reviews.text: The glycerin (glycerol) was not digested well by me. Took me two bottles to narrow it down to this product. I had the same reaction as if I was consuming Splenda, xylitol, mannitol, etc. I know there are reports that say glycerin is not digested the same as these products but I got the same reaction. We are all different, I know, but be aware that this can cause problems for some people if you have a super sensitive system toward these types of ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: devalen

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY - LIFE CHANGING
customer_reviews.text: 100% BEST product on the market for B12 supplements. Global Healing Center has done their research for sure. This product has changed my life. Don't be deterred by the cost, a dollar a day is PRICELESS when it comes to feeling and being your best self possible. I will never ever go without this. I promise it's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Also received an expired bottle
customer_reviews.text: Similar to a number of other reviews, I had ordered this product before and liked it, however the bottle I just received is stamped with an experation date from 2012.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Medical medium reccomended
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended this product through a wise friend because its also Medical medium recommended. She said i should consume daily. I've since heard that b12 should only be consumed under the tongue, which this dropper is used for, so I feel I made a great purchase. I don't feel nausea consuming on an empty stomach like I usually do with vitamin B's. Taste is not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Brought me back from a severe B 12 deficiency!
customer_reviews.text: I was really dizzy To the point of feeling like I would fall over. I had headaches and also felt weak. This product brought me back! My head is clear, my headaches have gotten much better and I am no longer dizzy. You have to give the product a chance. It took four months for me to bring my b12 back to normal. There is no sugar in this product, the sweetness comes from the glycerin in it. It will not raise blood sugar. There is a video on YouTube about this subject called “everything you need to know about vitamin B 12” by global healing center. It is a good informative listen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, works great and I feel a difference taking it. I have pernicious anemia, which means I don't absorb B12 from food. I get monthly shots but they wear off well before the month is over. This has made a big difference for me in getting through the month, I don't feel as run down as I normally would. The only problem with this is the price seems to vary greatly depending on the day! I bought this for $24.99 end of January and now it's listed as $41.99!!! Really???Almost double the price in 2 months which is crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Increased prices beware!
customer_reviews.text: Great product but the price is just getting ridiculous! This only lasts a month or 2.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expired from 2012
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding me?? I received an expired bottle from 2012!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've tried others...
customer_reviews.text: I keep coming back to this brand of B12. I can feel it when I take these. Others have no effect. I like the taste and actually look forward to taking it. Still, I wish it was cheaper because this is one of those supps I stick with.
customer_reviews.author: WyleeK

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great Might Be Great.
customer_reviews.text: I know this is no measure of product quality but I love how this tastes. Beyond that, I can't tell you for sure that I feel anything substantial from use of this product. It gets good reviews and seems to be a quality formulation. In our reality is is pricey and would take $$$ to maintain use of this. Right now for us, it's on the bubble but I think we can recommend it for you to try.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen C.

customer_reviews.title: Important supplement for MTHFR gene
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years, I have that MTHFR gene that blocks methylation and this is the product that my health practitioner prescribed. I’m not a big meat eater so I need to get my B12 daily from other sources, so this makes it easy.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki E

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me
customer_reviews.text: I've tried different kinds of B12 but this one is my favorite. It is expensive but it does seem to work. I have MTHFR and low homocysteine. Also low energy which goes up some when I take this B12. I'll have my homocysteine retested and then I will know how well this really works. I also take B6 and Methyl folate.
customer_reviews.author: H. Collins

customer_reviews.title: EXPIRED in 2012!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Expired in 2012!!!!! Unable to give zero stars or else I would have! Discovered this after the return window closed!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Phelan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the reviews but it did nothing for me or my husband. Tasted like sugar water.
customer_reviews.author: CJH

customer_reviews.title: Still sending expired product
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. After ordering I read the reviews about receiving expired product. I received mine today and it has a 2012 expiration too. Update: after clarification from the company that the last two digits are actually a lot number I tried the product. It tastes pleasant and I am beginning to notice an improvement in my energy and I sleep much better.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: this is great stuff! the only 2 complaints I have is that is a little too expensive and a little too sweet...but it does work, have been using this for 1 and half years now and I get my blood tested on a regular basis (2 times a year) and my B12 is always in perfect standing.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita

customer_reviews.title: The best b12 you can buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best b12 I’ve ever used. I used to deal with having b12 deficiency anemia and I could never find any b12 that helped and as soon as I take this the bruising and constant freezing feeling goes alway. I’m also pregnant so it helps a lot with morning sickness! I recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Ci Bratt

customer_reviews.title: Superior supplement and clean
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have to say that it did give me headaches the first week I started taking it, but they were only very brief. Now I just feel great and my symptoms of b12 deficiency are slowly but definitely diminishing. If you are feeling skeptical about buying this product - I urge you to still get it. I know it’s a little expensive but if you’re like me paying a little extra for potent&high quality doesn’t hurt too much.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Frykenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great product thats worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. I did not realize how much of a B12 deficiency I had until I started taking this product every morning. As a fairly new vegan I knew I needed a B12 supplement but not took my time getting around to it. Definitely wish I would've done it sooner. It gives such a natural boost of energy that lasts all throughout the day. The tastes is slightly unpleasant but definitely not unbearable. After the first day or so it was irrelevant. Overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tiara💋

customer_reviews.title: So far I dont feel any difference...
customer_reviews.text: I took it for B12 deficiency. Haven't had my tests yet but as far as an energy boost and all the other benefits I've seen in the comments I got nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Lior Boogtus

customer_reviews.title: I notice a difference
customer_reviews.text: This is the blend I wanted after researching B12. I believe it is doing well for me, although I’ve yet to get a blood test to see if my B12 levels have increased. I really can’t speak to absorbency, but I do notice a difference after beginning this daily regimen, especially because I am no longer experiencing odd nerve ending sensations. The drops are a bit spendy, but worth it if, as I suspect, my B12 levels have increased.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Everyone’s body reacts differently, but just try them and see if they work for you
customer_reviews.text: I’m typically anemic and deficient with my b-12 levels. I’ve tried shots and different vitamins in the past, but nothing ever worked. I was reluctant when I purchased these drops and wasn’t optimistic that they would actually work. After about three weeks of taking them as indicated and on a consistent basis, my energy definitely increased and I rarely slept as much as I normally would prior to the drops. Needless to say, I’m about to order them again!!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Austin

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I'm very unhappy with this price. I need b 12 monthly & I can't afford this monthly. This is very expensive to purchase each month. Very dissatisfied with this extreme price. High quality however after mortgage, utilities and groceries there not enough for monthly extras that are individually expensive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will be ordering every month!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this stuff!! I've gotten vitamin B12 shots & they are nothing compared to this stuff! Gives me energy & helps me think clearly! I have fibromyalgia & this has helped me feel so much better! Just make sure to take it early in the day because it will give you alot of energy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe and effective
customer_reviews.text: I use this brand of B-12 because it doesn't have alcohol. I noticed more energy within a week or so. Tastes pleasant, too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy K

customer_reviews.title: B-12 Feel better
customer_reviews.text: I feel great taking this everyday. Never get tired & tastes sweet like cherry. I just wish the price was $20, since $30 is like another bill to pay every month & is why if anyone wants to take this should have a alternative if money is tight. This is the best B-12 i have taken though, so far. My muscles & body feel better & do not ache as bad using it, every little bit helps.
customer_reviews.author: mark b

customer_reviews.title: Best vegan B-12
customer_reviews.text: I needed a vegan b-12 and one that had the right base ingredients. This fits all my criteria and it tastes great & works great. It’s important for vegans especially to watch their B-12 and the liquid absorbency makes this really easy and effective to take. I would buy other products from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: YUCK! Why is is so sweet?
customer_reviews.text: This B-12 liquid has an awful flavor. Its so thick and sickeningly sweet and I cant figure out what the flavor is, once its on my tongue I don’t want to swallow it, gross. I honestly don’t feel like I have any more energy either, in fact I have no idea why I even keep using it! Perhaps due to spending money on it I feel like I need to power through it. I defiantly wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tobi

customer_reviews.title: Review your exp date!!
customer_reviews.text: Great b12. Hate not knowing when it expires with all the other reviews showing expired products. Contact me to get your stars changed
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: the shots don't do anything like these drops do
customer_reviews.text: This really works! It's expensive , but it's natural and does the job , the shots don't do anything like these drops do , I give this five stars
customer_reviews.author: Helene jaeger

customer_reviews.title: Hasn’t been long enough?
customer_reviews.text: It’s really hard to tell a difference. Granted, I literally have taken 2-3 doses. I can say I haven’t wanted 5 hours as often, so it is doing something. If I feel different about it, will update. Also, prior I was taking an extremely high doses (unaware this was dangerous) and then switched. So this may play a role too. Oh, and I am not a fan of the flavor. Reminds me of cough syrup. My boyfriend likes it though.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Prater

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product and have only used it for the last 2 days, I’m very satisfied with my purchase already though! The flavor is a berry, maybe raspberry flavor but not too sweet. It’s a thicker consistency and absorbs well when held in the mouth for 15-20 seconds. I will have to have my B12 levels retested to see how well it’s working for me, but I was very pleased with the quality of the product and ingredients compared to other synthetic versions.
customer_reviews.author: Pétit Zebra

customer_reviews.title: B-12 blend works
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit this stuff is so potent that I take 1 drop or half of the dropper. gives me so much energy I can tell this calms me and also gives me bowl movements. Thank you Dr Edward group for this great product also thank you global healing center
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I am super satisfied with this product. I have dyshydrotic eczema and have tried every lotion, cream, steroid. Nothing was helping. My eczema was very painful, to the point my skin was cracking and bleeding. Within days my eczema started to improve.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Bad tasting
customer_reviews.text: I can’t really tell you if this is a good product or not but it tastes awful. It is so sweet that it makes you sick. I wasn’t able to use it more than a couple of times bc of the taste.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Better sleep and less mind fog
customer_reviews.text: I had no effect on my energy level, but maybe my B12 was fine. The effect I noticed was on sleep quality. I definitely need less hours of sleep - I wake up before my usual wake up time and I am rested. So it's like I slept deeper? I also noticed less brain fog and more moments of heightened mind clarity. It is definitely doing something
customer_reviews.author: HealthyFood1234

customer_reviews.title: The Potential this product may provide.
customer_reviews.text: The flavor of the B12 is just fine....no problem. The absorbency and value is still to be determined as I have only been using this product a few days. (I gave these two categories a 3 to fill in the blank stars) My health care provider mentioned it could take a minimum of two weeks or longer depending upon my system to see if the B12 will help enhance my energy. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Forte Green

customer_reviews.title: B12
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time using B12. I used the recommended dosage but found that it made my heart beat a little fast. The second day I took 1/2 a dose. That was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K.

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST version of B-12 with 2 formulations!
customer_reviews.text: I love this VeganSafe B-12 Organic Liquid Vitamin supplement. I can literally feel the energy returning only an hour after dosing. I use this first thing in the morning, before I eating/drinking anything for best results. It is the healthiest version and best formulation to assimilate the 2 forms of B-12 most people don't even know about!
customer_reviews.author: Petra Says

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Bottle tipped over and leaked onto counter...seal wasn’t broken, bottle was unopened!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Conover

customer_reviews.title: It gave me a boost plus stomach pains
customer_reviews.text: I am not a meat eater so I did get a nice boost from this. Shortly after taking it I got incredible lower stomach pains and nausea. I took it on an empty stomach. Next time I tried it with tea and toast in the morning. The same stomach issue again. There must be some ingredient that doesn't agree with me as I have a pretty tough stomach otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Dean

customer_reviews.title: Raised my levels!
customer_reviews.text: I discovered I had a vitamin B12 deficiency when I had blood work done. My doctor recommended I supplement and I decided on this one. When I retested my B12 level 3 months later, they had doubled! Pretty good proof there :)
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hyden

customer_reviews.title: Glad the Anthony William the medical medium suggested it on ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is legit! I've tried other B-12 sublinguals before and nothing compares. I never a difference with other brands. This one gives me instant energy without the jitters - no coffee needed. Glad Anthony William, the medical medium, suggested it on his website!
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: I really love this product
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product, but hate the price. I have to take too many supplements and it is just too expensive I most often cannot afford it.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Essential for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Great price for high absorbency b-12. Everyone needs b-12 in their life for a healthy functioning of their nervous system, production of energy from carbohydrates, fats, and proteins. It's also essential for a healthy nervous system, metabolic function, and red blood cell production.
customer_reviews.author: Rogan R

customer_reviews.title: Sweetener?
customer_reviews.text: I can only assume that this is raising my B12 levels. The solution is very sweet and I question whether a sweetener has been added.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Sweet medicine
customer_reviews.text: You have to place 1ml of this in your mouth and wait 15 secs before swallowing. I was like whaaa? Did it, it wasn't that inconvenient. Tasted like sweet medicine, the one you take when you were a kid. I'll be taking this everyday now.
customer_reviews.author: Tmien

customer_reviews.title: Better than shots
customer_reviews.text: I used to get B12 shots, and they were okay. After a shot that made me have a sore muscle for like a month, I decided there had to be a better way than getting a shot each month! And there is - THIS. This liquid gives me more energy and results than shots ever did. It tastes great, I honestly think it's caused some weight loss (along with a vegan diet) and I couldn't recommend it more highly. I've just ordered my third bottle, and if there was a monthly subscription I would get one. I'll need it forever!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great!
customer_reviews.text: Eating vegan requires B12 supplements so this is an easy way to get B12 without more pills to swallow. Tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: mckylie

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but it works!
customer_reviews.text: My B12 numbers went from 125 up to 745 in 3 months of daily use. No more B12 deficiency symptoms. The price is high but well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Ms  Bulldog

customer_reviews.title: Great taste feeling great
customer_reviews.text: Taste good no bad taste. If your looking for an energy bust this is not it. If your looking to feel good and feel like you had plenty of sleep and ready for the day this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Only B12 I use now
customer_reviews.text: According to Medical Medium, this is the BEST B12 and i have to admit that it is. My bloodwork showed sufficient B12 numbers this time. Worth the price and very easy to use. I can definitely tell a difference in my chronic illness symptoms.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great product price a little high
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! The only thing i would say is that i find the price to be a little high. The bottle isn’t that big. I wish they either sold a larger bottle or lowered the price because i would buy them a lot more often. I love this brand and have many other supplements from them that i absolutely love. This is the only one i wish was less expensive
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Quality B-12
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this several times a year for myself and my family to take daily as we are vegan and to support a healthy immune system. I do wish it weren't so expensive. It doesn't last very long for a family of four, so we alternate with the b-12 in our Dr. Fuhrman Multivitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Stain

customer_reviews.title: A must try!
customer_reviews.text: I sleep better, has helped with my energy level. Helped a little with moodiness. It's only been about 2 weeks since I started this. Maybe as time goes on, I will get even more benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Okay.. But it's too sweet!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what to say other than this product is too sweet for me. Plus I'm not really sure if it's helping me or not.
customer_reviews.author: Novalis K

customer_reviews.title: Liked the product, but the price increases have kept me from repurchase.
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy this brand for 24.99 a bottle. I have been loyal to this brand because I love the product but now that they are 42.99 for the same bottle I have moved onto another brand. It seems they are cashing in on Medical Medium and I think that does not make me want to support this company any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Christina V

customer_reviews.title: Acts like a sedative to me
customer_reviews.text: Every single time I take this product I become exhausted. It's as if I've taken a sleeping pill and no one in the medical medium group can tell me why. I don't overtake it and because it acts as a sedative in me, I rarely take it. I need someone to explain why this happens and if that's a safe reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Prudence Sanders

customer_reviews.title: different B12 it works
customer_reviews.text: i could feel the difference right away. you put a dropper full in mouth and swish it around then swallow. felt more energy
customer_reviews.author: KTG

customer_reviews.title: Better than my prescription
customer_reviews.text: Product really works and helps with my mood. I have anxiety and this helps regulate my mood so I don’t have panic attacks. I would rather take this then all the medicine they give out for anxiety these days.
customer_reviews.author: Paris Elliott

customer_reviews.title: It didn't do as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I saw an ad that said it would help the ringing in my ears along with the other vitamins I purchased
customer_reviews.author: hwnmanu

customer_reviews.title: Need that B12
customer_reviews.text: It tastes better than I thought it would! Like, really good. And the ingredients are very good. This is the best stuff to put in your body. Expensive but... you get what you pay for? Yeah. I think I did.
customer_reviews.author: Leah H.

customer_reviews.title: Great energy boost.
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty lax writing reviews, especially considering how much I benefit from everyone else's reviews on this site. I am taking the time to write this review because I am amazed at what I am feeling after taking this product. This is the third methycolbamin B-12 liquid that I have tried. The energetic effects are immediate and powerful. I am just sitting here kind of stunned with the buzz. Clearly, I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Barrington

customer_reviews.title: Just got it immediately could feel the difference between a cheaper brand
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome and works better than most b12 supplements ive taken
customer_reviews.author: Fret

customer_reviews.title: Best b12 out there
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this brand and always will. I know vimergy came out with a new one but i think ill stick to this one. This one has always made me feel good
customer_reviews.author: Vegan Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: It’s so sweet
customer_reviews.text: It’s sweet and syrupy. I have to take it down with water. But I dig it.
customer_reviews.author: JMahdie

customer_reviews.title: Love this easy to use product...
customer_reviews.text: I am vegan and am always concerned about getting enough B12 in my diet. This product is easy to use & tastes great. I've tried many sublingual tablets but found most take a long time to dissolve under the tongue, I like the convenience of using the dropper to administer my proper dosage.
customer_reviews.author: Echism

customer_reviews.title: I'm vegan and recently bought this...
customer_reviews.text: I'm vegan and recently bought this since I can't get B12 other than meat and fortified drinks. I've been taking it everyday in an empty stomach first thing in the morning. I'm very pleased with the taste and I know it's a great quality product from my research. I feel great everyday and it gives me an extra boost of energy even though I don't take the full dropper.
customer_reviews.author: Irene G

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to give a review this soon. I've only been using it for about a week. It was recommended to me for Vertigo, but my Vertigo is so sporadic, I can't tell yet if it's really helping.
customer_reviews.author: norma lembach

customer_reviews.title: Really like this!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this particular Vit B because it tastes good and doesn't upset my stomach even if I take on an empty stomach. I take so many supplements that it's nice to have a few that are liquid instead of pill form.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy & Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Get your B12
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal, I have reordered five times already. It is the BEST source of Vitamin B12 besides a real Vit drip. Taste great, just leave it under your tongue for thirty seconds; that's it!
customer_reviews.author: Dolby Dharma

customer_reviews.title: No Need for Shots Anymore
customer_reviews.text: I used to get weekly B-12 shots (of synthetic B12) but the positive effect only lasted a week. I started using these drops every day and I didn't feel like I needed the shots anymore. It tastes great to me, like sugar, but it's vegetable glycerin. It's the best B-12 supplement I could find on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Small & Petite

customer_reviews.title: B12
customer_reviews.text: I take every morning on an empty stomach, I use less than a full dropper (usually between the 50-75 mark) to 1) save money 2) I don’t think it’s necessary since it’s such a high dose and I’m a small person lol :)
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Polak

customer_reviews.title: Works but spendy.
customer_reviews.text: I could feel the difference in my energy level while taking this product. I would continue to buy it but it's just too expensive for the amount you get.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: bottle Top was not secured
customer_reviews.text: The bottle Top was not secured, product leaked. This slippery liquid was on everything. While taking the bottle out of the bubble wrap it slipped out of my hands and broke, there is nothing to return.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN S ALLEN

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste...
customer_reviews.text: I could not handle the taste of this. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Woman

product_meta.title: Global Healing Center Vegansafe B12, 2500 mcg Organic Sublingual Liquid Vitamin B12 Drops | 2-in-1 Methylcobalamin & Adenosylcobalamin Blend for Energy, Mood, and Heart Health, 30-Day Supply (1 Fl Oz)
feature_bullets: THE BEST B-12 AVAILABLE - Our B-12 blend of Methylcobalamin and Adenosylcobalamin is the most pure, active, bioavailable coenzyme combination available.
FEEL RESULTS FASTER - the potent blend of Methylcobalamin & Adenosylcobalamin is better absorbed and used more efficiently than other forms of B12.
EASY & DELICIOUS - Great tasting liquid formula with simple dosing make it easy to get the ENERGY your body needs! No more injections.
CERTIFIED ORGANIC - Our vegan safe formula is also free of gluten, soy, dairy, GMOs, nuts, sugar, artificial flavors, synthetic dyes, and toxic fillers. Safe for all diets!

NATURAL SLEEP SUPPORT - Researchers have linked methylcobalamin to positive effects on sleep due to its influence on melatonin secretion and light sensitivity. Energy throughout the day, sleep support at night!
